title: Funky★Glamourous
description:
1. Wonderful
2. Heat Island
3. This Is Love
4. Funky Glamourous
5. Kimi ga Iru Nara
6. Uwasa no Shinsou (The Truth Behind Rumors)
Tetsuya hears a nasty rumor about his childhood friend Momo and her “extracurricular activities”. He tries to discover for himself whether the rumor is true or not.

7. Splash!
We find ourselves with a typical young male who frequently stops by his favorite adult store to pick up a fix for his lonely nights by himself. Only this time he finds the shopkeeper's little sister running the store instead. What’s a horny guy to do?

8. Love & Hate
9. 48 no Hissatsuwaza (48 Sex-Position)
10. Mirai e no Kaeri Michi (Way Back to the Future)
11. Ofuro no Akiyama-san (Akiyama-san from the Bathroom)
